00010 template <class T>
00011 bool FromString(T& t,
00012                 const std::string& s,
00013                 std::ios_base& (*f)(std::ios_base&))
00014 {
00015     std::istringstream iss(s);
00016     return !(iss >> f >> t).fail();
00017 }

00019 template <class T>
00020 string ToString(T toBeConverted){
00021 
00022  // create an out string stream
00023  ostringstream buffer;
00024  // write the value to be converted to the output stream
00025  buffer << toBeConverted;
00026  // get the string value
00027  return buffer.str();
00028 };
